lead_paragraph: An article on Saturday about Larry Brown’s ties to the N.C.A.A. men’s basketball Final Four teams misstated one of his career moves. He left U.C.L.A. in 1981 to coach the Nets in the N.B.A. — not to coach Kansas, where he went in 1983 after leaving New Jersey.
